title: Flu Fighting Miso SoupTastemade
directions: First layer oreos on the bottom.
Spread some whipped cream on top of the oreos.
Then spread some cherries on top of the cream.
Repeat once again with oreos, cream and cherries. Layer with more oreos.
Place maraschino cherries on the top.
Add some crumbs to the top of the cake.
Refrigerate at least 3 hours preferably overnight until the oreos are soft.
Decorate the sides of the cake with more oreo crumbs if desired.
ingredients: 1/2 cup cherry jam, preserves or pie filling
